goal: Integrate all stage modules into cohesive system, implement cross-stage synthesis (project summary), create export/reporting, finalize deployment, and produce user documentation.
completion_note: CODE COMPLETE - All deliverables implemented. Pending E2E verification and deployment confirmation.

steps_completed.description: Create project summary view (aggregates data from all stages)
steps_completed.output: SummaryView.tsx created (259 lines) - loads all stage data, displays stage snapshots with presence indicators

steps_completed.description: Implement cross-stage AI synthesis (holistic innovation journey insights)
steps_completed.output: buildCrossStagePrompt() function creates comprehensive synthesis prompt across all 5 stages, generateWithGemini() produces executive summary with 7 sections

steps_completed.description: Build navigation between stages with data flow indicators
steps_completed.output: Summary tab integrated into Layout.tsx StageNav (first position), stage presence indicators show which stages have data

steps_completed.description: Implement PDF export of project data and synthesis
steps_completed.output: handlePrintPdf() uses window.print() for print-to-PDF functionality
buildMarkdownReport() generates formatted markdown with stage overviews and synthesis, handleDownloadMarkdown() creates downloadable .md file
handleShare() implements Web Share API with fallback to clipboard copy and mailto link
Deployment status unclear - requires user confirmation if Insforge backend configured and application deployed
steps_completed.notes: User action required - see NEXT_STEPS.md and DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md

steps_completed.output: E2E verification checklist available (SPECLET_6_E2E_VERIFICATION.md) but not yet executed

Client_User_Guide.md created with access instructions, navigation, reporting features, troubleshooting tips
Multiple deployment guides created: README.md (344 lines), DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md, INSFORGE_SETUP.md, QUICK_START_CHECKLIST.md

steps_completed.description: Verify data persistence across all stages
Verify AI synthesis working for all stages
steps_completed.notes: Requires Gemini API key configuration and E2E testing
Requires deployed application and device testing

features: Displays stage snapshots with presence indicators
Stage data summary with 'Has Data' / 'No Data' badges
Responsive grid layout (2 columns on desktop)
7-section synthesis output (executive summary, problem definition, top ideas, prototype plan, test highlights, risks, next actions)
Context-aware prompt building from all stage data
Graceful handling of missing/empty stage data

export_functionality.markdown_export: buildMarkdownReport() - generates formatted .md file with stage overviews and synthesis
export_functionality.pdf_export: handlePrintPdf() - browser print dialog for PDF save
export_functionality.share_functionality: handleShare() - Web Share API, clipboard fallback, mailto fallback

navigation_integration.implementation: Summary tab added as first tab in navigation
features: Summary link in main stage navigation
Stage presence indicators (dots showing which stages have data)
